title: Playtime
description: Children's wallpaper with reproductions of drawings by Kate Greenaway. Originally designed about 1902. Scene depicts children at play. One group is around a pool with fountain sailing boats. Another is playing at gardening. Some are at play with pails of sand. One small boy is driving a team of goats with two little girls in back seat of cart. Printed in selvedge: "British Made." Components "a" and "b" are the same design.
name: Sidewall
